items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sweater dress
items.body: Must buy. I LOVE this soooo much!!! I plan on saving up to buy another one. I wish I had them all Read more
items.author: Foster child

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I’m wearing this dress when I launch a business
items.body: The media could not be loaded. So…this boomer has a confession: I’m going to wear this dress when I launch a business. It just arrived. I’m very happy with it. The material is very soft. I like the thickness. It doesn’t show through while I have it on. I took a close up in the mirror so you could see that for yourself. I don’t have time now to take the really nice pictures that this dress deserves. I’ll come back later with that. And although the buttons are small, I found them easy to button and unbutton. I am able to slip this on and off without buttoning and unbuttoning. You can button it up to the last three top buttons. There aren’t button holes for the last three top button. There are button holes all the way to the bottom button. I ordered a small. I’m 5’2”; weight 127.5; measurements are about 39, 29, 39. Hope this helps you make a decision. Boomer CherylAE Read more
items.author: This Boomer CherylAE

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Runs Big
items.body: The quality and material are good. It runs big though. I'm normally a small, but the xs was to big. Had to return. Sad because it is perfect for fall. Read more
items.author: Melody

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars 10 outta 10
items.body: This dress is amazing. Easy to work in. Fits perfect. I’m 135 and got a small and it fits just right. Read more
items.author: Katie Spargo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Timeless dress
items.body: Perfect fit, stretching dress so if you’re between sizes pick either form fitting or looser. Classy with a hint of foxy Read more
items.author: J

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great staple
items.body: Super cute! I ordered a medium and it’s a perfect fit. 5’9, 150 pounds Read more
items.author: Meredith

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ordering More of This
items.body: I love everything about this dress. The warmth the dark color, the feel on my skin makes me happy. Which is a hard task since I'm hyper sensitive to fabrics and can get over stimulated. I did not feel in any way bothered by this dress the buttons or the material. I felt confident when wearing this stylish piece. I'm 5'1 and the length was perfect and as shown on ad. At 130ish lbs I ordered a medium and my chunky upper back of arm fat/skin still fit without feeling too tight! Sleeve length is good also. I was plesantly surprised about the quality tbh. Stitching is great and looks chic professional. I do not dry this in my machine. I want it to last. It hugs all my curves without bunching. Would order in other colors I love it that much. Read more
items.author: K. S.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars simple elegant dress!
items.body: Very sexy dress! It came pre-buttoned with a few buttons not buttoned at the bottom and I thought it would be good enough but I definitely needed to button it more! It's VERY sexy without really showing much at all and I love that in a dress. I really love a long, elegant dress that's simple. This dress does not have a lot to it, but when I put it on I felt so sexy and hot. It's got a good stretch to it, but not overly stretchy. The weight of the fabric is good, not too thin and warm enough that you could likely just wear it on its own when it's not too cold out. Definitely like it and will be wearing it more! Read more
items.author: Z

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi V Neck Long Sleeve Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi V Neck Long Sleeve Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine Red, Apricot, Royal Blue, Black, Khahi Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
